survey.title: AA Extended Use Concept/Product Test
survey.introduction: Hello, I'm from (Your Company), an independent marketing research company. We're conducting a survey with women about various consumer products.

questions.text: Into which of the following age groups does your age belong?
instructions: Terminate, erase and re-use if under 18 or refused.
Check quota to determine if 18-24 is needed.
If over quota, ask for another female in age group needed.

questions.text: Which of the following products do you use daily?
questions.instructions: Continue only if cigarettes checked above in Q.2. Otherwise, if none, terminate, erase and re-use.

questions.text: Which of the following brands have you used in the past week?
